email.subject: Thank You For Playing Hacker Wars
email.body:
Hi there #PLAYERNAME#,
Due to an ongoing investigation going by the name of 'Unknown', the ICD have been forced to temporarily close Hacker Wars for this year, we therefore cannot declare an official winner for this year, due to your performance through the Hacker Wars games, you have been invited to participate in next years games.
Congratulations, #PLAYERNAME#!
------------------------------------------------------ This originally started out as a bit of half-term project but has vast taken over the last couple of weeks as more and more ideas have been thrown at it. If you have enjoyed this extension please feel free to leave a comment/rating/favourite. If you have not feel free to drop a comment about your ideas of improvement. Thank you very much for playing through this Hacknet Extension. You will find the credits server attached.
If link doesn't work, connect up to "225.224.225.224" (There's some more awesome music for it? :D) - Admiral Joshua
